Volunteer to test it!!!
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: Yanshosh@ao=
l.com 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Wednesday, April 18, 2001 12:3=
9 AM
  Subject: Beta Login Test Released


  After days of slaving over chu=
nks of code, learning chunks of new
  stuff, and fixing countless bugs, I h=
ave managed to get a working
  version of the soon-to-be multi-featured NBW=
 Site Login Script to
  work. Now I need a few (the more the better) to hel=
p me test it.

  The script can be found at:

  http://nbwrpg.com/nbwrpg/cg=
i-bin/Login/login.cgi

  What I want you guys to do is log in as the test a=
ccount (username:
  "test", password: "test". CASE SENSITIVE, no quote mark=
s), and put the
  server through as much hell as possible. Make profiles wi=
th funky
  characters, HTML code, names with spaces, names with funky chara=
cters,
  anything imaginable to try to completely confuse the system. If it=

  crashes on you, please email me and tell me exactly what you did prior
 =
 to it crashing, and I'll fix the bug. Right now all that is available
  is=
 the character editor/maker/viewer/killer, but as soon as it is
  totaly de=
bugged, more stuff will be made available, like polls, chat,
  and stuff li=
ke that.

  I hope as many people as possible participate in this. Besides,=
 its
  fun crashing my comp, and here's your chance to! :-)

  I'll be expe=
cting a flood of bug reports tomorrow. Get to work,
  testers! I'm also tot=
aly wasted from all the programming, so I'm going
  to bed. Goodnight, ever=
yone.


        Yahoo! Groups Sponsor 
       
       

  Your use of Yahoo=
! Groups is subject to the Yahoo! Terms of Service.
